messages.message: hi, trying to get my sandbox (https://instabase.sandboxes.site/sandboxes/ayeshaali?cw=dev) started today and all my services are failing to start with this error `ERROR: error during connect: Head "http://%2Fvar%2Frun%2Fdocker.sock/_ping": read unix @->/run/docker.sock: read: connection reset by peer` tried to restart sandbox a few times but it didn't help
huh, I ran `docker system prune` and tested with api-server, restarting it and its up now, does this work for you? restarting the rest of my services now to see
i tried running `docker system prune -a`  but it was giving me the same error, let me see again
yeah `docker system prune` fails with the same error ://
ah dang, ya I was able to run it after seeing the exact error in my service logs. All I tried before it was suspending for a minute and restarting, which you did :thinking_face:

hmm yeah, i have another sandbox up so not a big deal rn but yeah weird, i saw a slack msg w/ the same thing like a year ago and it seemed to work after restarting a couple times more and then they were able to run docker prune so maybe i'll try that later
